Logomorph? Oh! I get it, it sounds like Lagomorph! Clever. I got SOULSTICE
as my name (Thanks for calling me that) because that's what Hasbro was going
to call Windrazor but they changed it, so I got the name SOULSTICE instead.
I'm a Demuxe figure myself and can transform into a spider, a tarantula as a
matter of fact. I have 3 tarantulas, so you see that I like them alot. Got 2
scorpions as well. So you can see I love them, too. Yeah, arachnids are my
animal passion, so what? But my real passion lies in Beast Wars and the
greatest game ever, Final Fantasy 3! (6 in Japan) Yeah, I know my characters
are in tight spots, but as soon as Dracona gets reprogrammed I'll be back in
action...Hopefully...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 21, 2000 4:30 PM
Subject: Re: Sorry.


> OOC:( Oh boy, I feel sorry for you then.  I shall call you as you
> have requested Soulstice. I got the name for my email from the
> reclassification of a rabbit.  Rabbits and hares are no longer
> classified as rodents, but as logomorphs.  That's how I came up with
> my email. OK, so I'm a nature buff. Sue me)
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > One thing, though, please stop calling me the Code! The name is
> SOULSTICE,
> > this is my only e-mail adress and I prefer that nobody calls me
> that,
> > because I didn't get to choose my e-mail adress, my mom did, heh
> heh...
